Articles.Content: Maybe a very basic question, but do the habitat or other parts from the kpbs count for base building missions when it comes to facilitating kerbals?

As far as I know, the habitat parts from kpbs do count towards crew capacity for base building missions, but I have had some problems with some of the deployable habitats not being detected. Not sure if you may have this issue.

Are you asking about "contracts", or Making History "missions"?

KPBS worked okay with contracts during a prior career playthrough but I don't use missions.
